amendments.title: Draft Notification of Food Safety and Standards
amendments.summary: The Food Safety and Standards Authority of India proposes to amend the Food Safety and Standards (Labelling and Display) Regulations, 2020.
requirements: amendments to the Food Safety and Standards (Labelling and Display) Regulations, 2020
changes to the labelling requirements for food products
inclusion of nutrition information on food labels
specifications for the display of food products
compliance with the Food Safety and Standards Act, 2006
adherence to the regulations by food business operators
provision of information to consumers about the food products
amendments.details: Food business operators are expected to comply with the amended regulations, which include providing nutrition information on food labels, following specific labelling requirements, and ensuring compliance with the Food Safety and Standards Act, 2006.
